data_table.description: Siting Blood Pressure, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SBPC2
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Any tobacco in last 4 hours? Q2 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC4
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Any caffeine in last 4 hours? Q4 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC7
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Cuff size. Q7 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC1
variable.description: [Temperature]. Room temperature in Celsius. Q1 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC6
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Right arm circumference (cm). Q6 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC8
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Heart rate (30 seconds). Q8 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC10
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Pulse obliteration pressure. Q10 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC11
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Maximum zero. Q11 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC12
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Peak inflation level. Q12 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC13
variable.description: 1st systolic blood pressure measurement, systolic. Q13 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC14
variable.description: 1st diastolic blood pressure measurement, diastolic. Q14 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC15
variable.description: 1st blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q15 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC16
variable.description: 2nd systolic blood pressure measurement, systolic. Q16 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC17
variable.description: 2nd diastolic blood pressure measurement, diastolic. Q17 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC18
variable.description: 2nd blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q18 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC19
variable.description: 3rd systolic blood pressure measurement, systolic. Q19 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC20
variable.description: 3rd diastolic blood pressure measurement, diastolic. Q20 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC21
variable.description: 3rd blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q21 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC22
variable.description: [Computed net average of second and third blood pressure measurements]. 2nd and 3rd systolic blood pressure average. Q22 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC23
variable.description: [Computed net average of second and third blood pressure measurements]. 2nd and 3rd diastolic blood pressure average. Q23 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPCCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPCFLAG
variable.description: 1=> SBPC form is present [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC3MN
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Time in minutes since last use of tobacco [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC5MN
variable.description: [Tobacco and caffeine use]. Time in minutes since last coffee, tea or chocolate [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: SBPC9HM
variable.description: [Preliminary measurements]. Time of day of blood pressure measurement [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 3]
